# âœ… isHex

Simple Python package to check if string is valid hexadecimal.  

## ğŸš€ Usage

```python
from isHex import isHex

# Check invalid hexadecimal
isHex('abcg7') # Returns False

#Check valid hexadecimal
isHex('aBcDeF1234567890') # Returns True
```
